pageTitle: Chrome 415 Work Boots - Road Shoes | Competitive Cyclist
title: Footwear
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {27628=Chrome's 415 Work Boots are made from an almost identical fabric to what's used in its messenger bags — 1000 denier Cordura. As you probably know, this stuff is strong — like we've had the same Chrome bag for nine years strong. And aside from the upper material selection, Chrome made the whole shoe resilient to the day-to-day thrashings of urban riding and, well, life. The sole is made from ultra-durable vulcanized rubber, and its also been made skid-resistant for riding/walking in all weather conditions. For the construction, Chrome used a board lasted sole to stiffen up the shoes and to eliminate the threat of hot spots., 68932=the picture says 1000 words !}
